Service Details: - Provides community-based alcohol and drug treatment and prevention services for youth and adults from prevention to intensive treatment- Provides harm reduction and abstinence based counselling services- Offers counselling for both mental health and substance use- Individual and group services available- Referrals to residential treatment- Offers support to family members affected by substance use
